item.title: Lovesac Co 10-K
item.description: Lovesac Co, which is in the Retail-Furniture Stores [5712] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 14, 2021 had 22870 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 278 instances 2021 - 226 instances financial - 218 instances may - 212 instances fiscal - 204 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
